description: Have you tried traditional medicine before and you're still not feeling right? Stuck in a rut? Not able to reach your goals?
cleaned_text: Clicking on the Send Me Details Now button opens an enquiry form where you can message Sinead Kelly directly [Send Me Details Now](https://www.naturaltherapypages.com.au/enquiry/551968/form) About Well Of Harmony - Holistic Kinesiology & Wellbeing Servicing areaRedlands and Surrounds Brisbane Focus areas Welcome to Well of Harmony Have you tried traditional medicine before and you're still not feeling right? Stuck in a rut? Not able to reach your goals? Well of Harmony is a holistic health and wellbeing centre that balances your soul, body and mind. Our range of services include: - Energy healing - Aromatherapy - Mind Body Medicine - Children Services - Holistic Kinesiology We work with you to understand your needs and use our expert knowledge and safe environment to help you reach your goals. We are trained Mind Body Medicine Practitioners and Holistic Kinesiologists who are extremely passionate about Energy Healing and Essential Oils. Our sessions utilise a mix of all these services where appropriate for you and for what we are working towards. At Well of Harmony we are dedicated and passionate about assisting people to understand themselves and to achieve true happiness and health. If you would like to improve your life, wellbeing and health, contact us or visit our website [here](http://wellofharmony.com.au/).
